title: Link to the Past - Structured Prompts Example
synopsis: A young warrior in green tunic and hat embarks on an epic quest through a mythical castle.

shots.title: Warrior's Entrance
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** A lone young warrior in a green tunic and pointy green hat, carrying a sword and shield.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Traditional green tunic with golden trim, pointy green hat with a red feather, leather boots, sword strapped to back, round wooden shield in hand.

**Pose / Action:** Standing confidently at the castle entrance, shield raised defensively, sword hand ready at hip, feet planted firmly in a battle stance.

**Expression / Emotion:** Determined and focused expression, eyes scanning the environment for threats, slight furrow in brow showing readiness for battle.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Medium shot from slightly low angle, rule of thirds composition with warrior positioned left of center, castle entrance visible in background.

**Environment / Background:** Ancient stone castle entrance with torch-lit corridors, moss-covered walls, atmospheric fog, medieval architecture with arched doorways.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Dramatic torch lighting casting flickering shadows, cool blue moonlight filtering through castle windows, atmospheric fog creating depth and mystery.

**Style Enhancers:** High contrast lighting, cinematic color grading with warm torch tones against cool shadows, subtle motion blur, depth of field effects focusing on the warrior.

shots.title: Battle Preparation
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** The young warrior in green tunic and hat, preparing for combat.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Green tunic with golden embroidery, pointy green hat with red feather, leather armor pieces, sword drawn and gleaming, shield held ready.

**Pose / Action:** Dynamic combat stance, sword raised in defensive position, shield angled to deflect attacks, body turned slightly for mobility, weight on back foot.

**Expression / Emotion:** Intense focus and determination, eyes locked on unseen enemy, jaw set with resolve, slight snarl showing battle readiness.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Close-up shot focusing on upper body and face, dramatic angle from below, tight composition emphasizing the warrior's determination.

**Environment / Background:** Stone castle corridor with flickering torchlight, ancient tapestries on walls, stone pillars creating depth, atmospheric shadows.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Dramatic side lighting from torches, strong contrast between light and shadow, warm golden torchlight against cool stone, atmospheric smoke.

**Style Enhancers:** High contrast lighting, dramatic shadows, cinematic color grading, sharp focus on facial features, motion blur suggesting movement.

shots.title: Heroic Charge
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** Warrior charging forward with sword and shield, action-packed movement.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Green tunic flowing with movement, hat secured tightly, armor pieces catching light, sword extended forward, shield raised for protection.

**Pose / Action:** Full sprint forward, sword thrust ahead, shield raised to block, body leaning into the charge, legs in mid-stride, dynamic action pose.

**Expression / Emotion:** Fierce determination and courage, eyes focused ahead, mouth open in battle cry, intense energy and bravery in expression.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Wide action shot from side angle, capturing full body movement, dynamic composition with motion lines, castle corridor extending into distance.

**Environment / Background:** Long stone corridor with torches lining walls, stone pillars creating depth, atmospheric fog, medieval castle architecture.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Dynamic lighting from multiple torches, motion blur from movement, dramatic shadows, warm torchlight creating action atmosphere.

**Style Enhancers:** Motion blur effects, dynamic camera movement, action-oriented color grading, cinematic framing, energetic atmosphere.

shots.title: Victory Moment
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** Warrior standing triumphant after battle, sword raised in victory.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Green tunic slightly disheveled from battle, hat still in place, sword held high in victory pose, shield at side, battle-worn but proud.

**Pose / Action:** Standing tall with sword raised overhead in victory gesture, shield resting at side, chest out with pride, head held high in triumph.

**Expression / Emotion:** Triumphant and proud expression, eyes bright with victory, slight smile of accomplishment, confidence and satisfaction in features.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Heroic low-angle shot, warrior centered in frame, sword pointing skyward, dramatic composition emphasizing victory and heroism.

**Environment / Background:** Castle chamber with high ceilings, torchlight illuminating the space, stone walls with victory banners, atmospheric and grand.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Heroic lighting from above, warm golden glow, dramatic shadows creating depth, triumphant and victorious atmosphere.

**Style Enhancers:** Heroic lighting effects, cinematic color grading with warm tones, dramatic shadows, epic atmosphere, victorious mood.

shots.title: Mystical Discovery
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** Warrior discovering a magical artifact or portal, wonder and amazement.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Green tunic and hat, sword and shield at ready, magical light reflecting off armor, mystical glow surrounding the character.

**Pose / Action:** Cautious approach to magical object, sword lowered but ready, shield held defensively, body language showing curiosity and wonder.

**Expression / Emotion:** Wonder and amazement, eyes wide with discovery, mouth slightly open in awe, expression of childlike wonder and excitement.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Medium shot with magical object in foreground, warrior in mid-ground, mystical background, balanced composition showing discovery.

**Environment / Background:** Mystical chamber with glowing crystals, ancient runes on walls, magical light sources, ethereal atmosphere, otherworldly setting.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Magical lighting with multiple colors, ethereal glow, mystical atmosphere, soft magical light creating wonder and mystery.

**Style Enhancers:** Magical lighting effects, ethereal color grading, mystical atmosphere, soft focus effects, otherworldly mood.

shots.title: Epic Finale
shots.prompt:
**Main Subject:** Warrior standing at the peak of achievement, ready for final challenge.

**Clothing / Appearance:** Green tunic and hat, battle-worn but proud, sword and shield ready for final battle, heroic stance, determined appearance.

**Pose / Action:** Standing at castle peak or high point, sword and shield at ready, body turned toward final challenge, heroic and determined pose.

**Expression / Emotion:** Ultimate determination and resolve, eyes showing wisdom and experience, confident and ready expression, hero's journey completion.

**Camera Direction & Framing:** Epic wide shot from below, warrior silhouetted against sky, dramatic composition, castle and landscape visible, heroic scale.

**Environment / Background:** Castle tower or high point, dramatic sky with clouds, vast landscape below, epic scale, final challenge location.

**Lighting & Atmosphere:** Epic lighting with dramatic sky, golden hour or stormy atmosphere, heroic shadows, grand and epic scale lighting.

**Style Enhancers:** Epic scale cinematography, dramatic sky effects, heroic lighting, cinematic color grading, grand and epic atmosphere.
